means: 离开( depart的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He departed this world with a sense of having fulfilled his destiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 他带着一种已完成使命的满足感离开了这个世界。

sentence.Network_en: When she had departed, they fell to fighting among themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 她走后，他们便互相打了起来。

sentence.Network_en: We held services for the departed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们为死者举行了仪式。

entry.def: Departed friends or relatives are people who have died.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is no longer alive;

sentences.sentence: "I wonder what the dead person would have done"
"you must not allow a stranger into the house when your mother is away"
